description: A simple yet mouthwatering treat that delivers a delightful crunch and tender juiciness with every bite.
ingredients: [{"name": "Skinless chicken breasts", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Kosher salt", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Black pepper", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Parmesan cheese", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Italian or plain breadcrumbs", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Virgin olive oil", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Vegetable oil", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Garlic powder", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Onion powder", "units": null, "amount": null}]
instructions: 1. Flatten the chicken breasts between plastic wrap using a meat mallet. 2. Season with salt and pepper. 3. Prepare a breadcrumb mixture with breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. 4. Dredge the chicken in flour, dip in egg, and coat with breadcrumbs. 5. Heat oil in a pan and fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides. 6. Serve with fresh parsley.
notes: For gluten-free options, use gluten-free breadcrumbs. For vegetarian variations, substitute chicken with eggplant or zucchini.
tags: Italian, Chicken, Main Course, Easy Recipe
